summary: This bill directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to update directives regarding the management of acute sexual assault within the Department of Veterans Affairs. It mandates updates to policies and guidance for VA employees, including requirements for medical facilities to employ or refer veterans to certified SAFE or SANE providers, provide necessary medical interventions (like STI/pregnancy prophylaxes), and offer mental health counseling. The bill also specifies training for both Veterans Health Administration employees and police officers, including requirements for in-person training. Finally, it outlines oversight measures for compliance and defines key terms related to acute sexual assault.
